thread.title: Great place at fantastic location
thread.title_full: Great place at fantastic location - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Naresh B R
title: Great place at fantastic location
text:
I stayed here on a business trip for 8 nights....the room & bathroom are really nice, modern & clean. The staff at front desk are very helpful, check in & check out were very smooth, they have a nice facility to keep your luggage safe on check out. The room service was super quick considering the size of the hotel. The rooftop bar is worth visiting at night, super relaxing with nice view. The location is perfect, main time square is just 200meters away, central park is at just 15minutes walking distance.
I would love to stay here for all my future business & family visits at NYC.
Please keep up the high standards of Hyatt
Room Tip: Ask for a higher floor for a good view See more room tips
